custom-zone-sets.name: Coding Layout - 3 Column
custom-zone-sets.description: Perfect for coding: Left sidebar (25%) for file explorer, Center (50%) for main editor, Right sidebar (25%) for terminal/output

custom-zone-sets.name: Productivity - Quad Split
custom-zone-sets.description: Four equal quadrants for multitasking: Top-left for browser, Top-right for email, Bottom-left for documents, Bottom-right for chat/notes

custom-zone-sets.name: Content Creation - Main + Side
custom-zone-sets.description: Main workspace (70%) for content creation, Side panel (30%) for reference materials or tools

custom-zone-sets.name: Video Editing - Timeline Focus
custom-zone-sets.description: Top-left (60%x70%) for preview, Top-right (60%x30%) for effects/tools, Bottom (40%x100%) for timeline

custom-zone-sets.name: Research - Triple Stack
custom-zone-sets.description: Three horizontal zones for comparing documents or research papers side by side

custom-zone-sets.name: Presentation Mode
custom-zone-sets.description: Main presentation area (80%) with notes/controls strip (20%) at bottom

custom-zone-sets.name: Gaming/Streaming Layout
custom-zone-sets.description: Center-top (75%x60%) for game, Side panels for chat/alerts, Bottom strip for OBS/controls

custom-zone-sets.name: Ultrawide Coding - 4 Column
custom-zone-sets.description: Optimized for ultrawide monitors: File tree (20%), Two editors (35% each), Mini terminal (10%)

custom-zone-sets.name: Data Analysis - Dashboard
custom-zone-sets.description: Six equal zones for multiple data visualizations and analysis tools

custom-zone-sets.name: Focus Mode - Centered
custom-zone-sets.description: Single centered zone (75% width) for distraction-free work with margins on sides
